entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
